title: Strictly Come Dancing's Halloween costumes: whose frocks were a fright and whose were ghoulishly good?
text:
Scottish Ballet senior wardrobe technician Ciara Nolan gives us her verdict on this year's Halloween costumes.

We have finally reached Halloween Week, traditionally one of the most thrilling nights on the Strictly calendar. And as the remaining couples set out to impress the judges, the costume department had plenty of tricks up its sleeve to provide the costume treats we have all been waiting for.

Injuries plagued the show this week with professional dancer Neil Jones and contestant Will Bayley resting up and missing their performances. Luckily for Neil’s celebrity partner Alex Scott, Kevin Clifton stepped in for their Ghostbusters-themed routine. Injuries are a huge part of the dance world...
description: Scottish Ballet senior wardrobe technician Ciara Nolan gives us her verdict on this year's Halloween costumes.
